51#ifndef AM_DEVICES_I3C_LPS22HH_H
52#define AM_DEVICES_I3C_LPS22HH_H
53
54#ifdef __cplusplus
55extern "C"
56{
57#endif
58
59//*****************************************************************************
60//
63//
64//*****************************************************************************
65#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_MAX_DEVICE_NUM 1
66
67#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_DEVICE_ID 0xB3
68#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATIC_ADDRESS_1 0x5C
69#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATIC_ADDRESS_2 0x5D
70#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_DYNAMIC_ADDRESS 0x22
71#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_MAX_WRITE_LENGTH 0x40FF
72#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_MAX_READ_LENGTH 0x2020FF
73#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_DMA_DELAY_US 100
74
75#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_WHO_AMI_I 0x0F
76#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_CTRL_REG1 0x10U
77#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_CTRL_REG2 0x11U
78#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_CTRL_REG3 0x12U
79#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_FIFO_CTRL 0x13U
80#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_FIFO_WTM 0x14U
81#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_INT_SOURCE 0x24U
82#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_FIFO_STATUS1 0x25U
83#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_FIFO_STATUS2 0x26U
84#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS 0x27U
85#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_PRESS_OUT_XL 0x28U
86#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_PRESS_OUT_L 0x29U
87#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_PRESS_OUT_H 0x2AU
88#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_TEMP_OUT_L 0x2BU
89#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_TEMP_OUT_H 0x2CU
90
91#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_RESET_MSK 0x4U
92#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_BLOCK_DATA_MSK 0x2U
93
94#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_PRESSURE_DATA_AVALIABLE 0x1U
95#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_TEMP_DATA_AVALIABLE 0x2U
96#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_TRANSFER_DELAY_TIME 200
97#define AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_DMA_TIMEOUT_CNT 1000
99
100//*****************************************************************************
101//
102// Global type definitions.
103//
104//*****************************************************************************
105typedef enum
106{
107 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS_SUCCESS,
108 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS_ERROR,
109 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE,
110 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS_IN_USE,
111 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS_TIMEOUT,
112 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE,
113 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_STATUS_INVALID_ARG,
114} am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_status_t;
115
116typedef struct
117{
118 uint32_t *pCmdRingBuf;
119 uint32_t ui32CmdRingBufLen;
120 uint32_t *pRespRingBuf;
121 uint32_t ui32RespRingBufLen;
122
123 uint32_t (*pfnI3cTimeoutCallback)(bool *pDMAComplete);
124 bool *pDMAComplete;
125} am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_dma_config_t;
126
127typedef struct
128{
129 // Host config
130 am_hal_i3c_xfer_mode_e eTransferMode;
131 am_hal_i3c_speed_mode_e eSpeedMode;
132
133 uint8_t ui8DynamicAddr;
134 am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_dma_config_t sI3cDmaCfg;
135} am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_config_t;
136
137typedef enum
138{
139 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_POWER_DOWN = 0x00,
140 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_ONE_SHOOT = 0x08,
141 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_1_Hz = 0x01,
142 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_10_Hz = 0x02,
143 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_25_Hz = 0x03,
144 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_50_Hz = 0x04,
145 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_75_Hz = 0x05,
146 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_1_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x11,
147 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_10_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x12,
148 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_25_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x13,
149 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_50_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x14,
150 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_75_Hz_LOW_NOISE = 0x15,
151 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_100_Hz = 0x06,
152 AM_DEVICES_LPS22HH_200_Hz = 0x07,
153} am_devices_i3c_lps22hh_odr_t;
154
